pollaxmud.entities

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • pollaxmud.entities.Course

  • public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a course. A course consists of a Name(title), a CourseBook, an amount of high school points it is worth and a list of Questions.
    Author:
    Daniel and Oscar

    • Constructor Detail

      • Course

        public Course(java.lang.String name,
              Book book,
              int HP)
        The constructor for a course.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the course.
        book - The book that corresponds to the course.
        HP - The amount of high school points the course is worth.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Method to get the course name.
        Returns:
        The name of the course.

      • getAbbrName

        public java.lang.String getAbbrName()
        Abbreviates the course name.
        Returns:
        If the course name is greater than 25 characters, then the first 26 characters of the course name + "...", else the course name.

      • getHP

        public int getHP()
        Getter for the course HP.
        Returns:
        The course HP.

      • getBookName

        public java.lang.String getBookName()
        Method for getting the name of the book that corresponds to the course.
        Returns:
        If the course have a corresponding book (i.e. Book is not null), then the name of the book, else "No book".

      • addQuestion

        public void addQuestion(Question newQuestion)
        Adds the question newQuestion to the course Question list.
        Parameters:
        newQuestion - The question to add.

      • returnRandomQuestion

        public Question returnRandomQuestion()
        Get a random question from the course Question list.
        Returns:
        A random question from Question list.

      • hasNoQuestions

        public boolean hasNoQuestions()
        Check if the course have any questions in its Question list or not.
        Returns:
        True if the Question list is empty, else false.

      • printAllQuestions

        public void printAllQuestions()
        Method that prints all the questions in the course Question list.

      • getBook

        public Book getBook()
        Method for getting the Book that corresponds to the course.
        Returns:
        The Book corresponding to the course.
